gameDetails.name: Highway to the Reich: Operation Market-Garden 17-26 September 1944
gameDetails.description:
Highway to the Reich is a tactical company/troop level simulation of the Allied/German combat which took place during the critical ten day period of Operation Market-Garden: September 17-26, 1944.  The game simulates the over 35,000 Allies dropped from the skies of Holland to take and hold a crucial stretch of highway with its bridges.

Contains four 22" x 34" four color soft maps (in use the maps require 108" x 34"), over 2,000 die-cut counter playing pieces (2400 total on 6 counter sheets), 32 page rule book, various charts and playing aids including German off board movement.


Re-implemented by:

     Highway to the Reich: The Allied Airborne Invasion of Holland, 1944 (Third Edition)
